sentences.sContent: While city hospitals were flooded with people suffering from food poisoning and heatstroke, most casualties were found in remote rural villages.
sentences.sContent_eng: While city hospitals were flooded with people suffering from food poisoning and heatstroke, most casualties were found in remote rural villages.
sentences.sCn: 虽然市区医院里挤满了食物中毒与中暑的人群，但人员伤亡最为严重的是偏远的农村。

sentences.sContent: Over the coming century, climate change will worsen virtually every health problem we know of, from heart disease and heatstroke to salmonella and insect-borne infectious diseases.
sentences.sContent_eng: Over the coming century, climate change will worsen virtually every health problem we know of, from heart disease and heatstroke to salmonella and insect-borne infectious diseases.
sentences.sCn: 在即将到来的世纪，气候变化将导致健康问题恶化，这几乎涉及我们所熟知的所有健康问题：如心脏病、中暑沙门氏菌和虫媒传染病。

trans.tranOther: fever and weakness caused by being outside in the heat of the sun for too long
